thread.title: Kawhi Leonard of the Los Angeles Clippers drives to the basket against Isaac Okoro in the Clippers' NBA victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers
thread.title_full: Kawhi Leonard of the Los Angeles Clippers drives to the basket against Isaac Okoro in the Clippers' NBA victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers

author: Katelyn Mulcahy
title: Kawhi Leonard of the Los Angeles Clippers drives to the basket against Isaac Okoro in the Clippers' NBA victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers
text:
Kawhi Leonard scored 33 points and Ivica Zubac added 28 on his 28th birthday on Tuesday as the Los Angeles Clippers rallied to hand the NBA-leading Cleveland Cavaliers a second straight defeat, 132-119.
